video.title: Comedy Bang! Bang!
video.synopsis: Scott Aukerman brings his popular podcast Comedy Bang! Bang! to television, along with his co-host and bandleader, Reggie Watts.

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman and guest Zach Galifianakis discuss Zach's place in the pantheon of comic actors, and also talking dogs.
episodes.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears A Blue Jacket & Red Socks

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman confronts guest Amy Poehler about her hair, and her feud with Mad Magazine.
episodes.title: Amy Poehler Wears A Black Jacket & Grey Pants

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman allows a film student to direct his interview with guest Jon Hamm.
episodes.title: Jon Hamm Wears A Light Blue Shirt & Silver Watch

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman and guest Michael Cera discuss Michael's disappointment about not getting cast in the part of his dreams.
episodes.title: Michael Cera Wears A Blue Denim Shirt & Red Pants

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman interviews Seth Rogen about his recent vacation.
episodes.title: Seth Rogen Wears A Plaid Shirt & Brown Pants

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman welcomes guest Paul Rudd, and discovers they both have a love of mime.
episodes.title: Paul Rudd Wears A Red Lumberjack Flannel Shirt

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman invites guest Ed Helms to display his banjo prowess and make animal noises.
episodes.title: Ed Helms Wears A Grey Shirt & Brown Boots

episodes.synopsis: When his guest Elizabeth Banks says the word of the day, host Scott Aukerman is forced to take action.
episodes.title: Elizabeth Banks Wears A Red Dress

episodes.synopsis: Scott Aukerman welcomes television star Adam Scott to discuss his workout regimen, but they are interrupted by a surprise visit from a Magic Window.
episodes.title: Adam Scott Wears A Red Oxford Shirt & Jeans

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman welcomes guest "Weird Al" Yankovic, who smashes all musical conventions.
episodes.title: Weird Al Yankovic Wears A Hawaiian Shirt

episodes.synopsis: We find out what Scott and Reggie have been up to since last season and Reggie enters a cybernetic computer world. Scott interviews Andy Samberg.
episodes.title: Andy Samberg Wears a Plaid Shirt & Glasses

episodes.synopsis: An elite team is dispatched inside Scott to cure his cold while he interviews Aziz Ansari and craft services coordinator Fabrice Fabrice (Nick Kroll).
episodes.title: Aziz Ansari Wears a Charcoal Blazer

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Reggie preview their new movie and special guest Anna Kendrick time travels. The studio takes on a tropical twist.
episodes.title: Anna Kendrick Wears a Patterned Blouse & Burgundy Pants

episodes.synopsis: Scott Aukerman and musical cohort Reggie Watts with guest stars David Cross and Will Forte. An unlikely narrator chronicles this week's adventures.
episodes.title: David Cross Wears a Red Polo Shirt and Brown Shoes with Red Laces

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort Reggie Watts with guest stars Zoe Saldana and Paul F. Tompkins. Scott hits the street to pull pranks.
episodes.title: Zoe Saldana Wears a Tan Blouse and Glasses

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort Reggie Watts with guest stars Gillian Jacobs and Jason Mantzoukas. A visit from Italian Chef Emeril Luigi.
episodes.title: Gillian Jacobs Wears a Red Dress with Sail Boats

episodes.synopsis: Host Scott Aukerman and musical cohort Reggie Watts visit the big apple. Special guest stars Andy Richter and Mike Hanford.
episodes.title: Andy Richter Wears a Suit Jacket and a Baby Blue Button Down Shirt

episodes.synopsis: Scott gets tongue-tied! Will his trusty advisors come to his rescue and save Sarah's interview? Scott reveals his secrets to getting camera ready.
episodes.title: Sarah Silverman Wears a Black Dress with a White Collar

episodes.synopsis: Bill has major revelations! Reggie joins via satellite while America's favorite game show interrupts Comedy Bang! Bang! Scott avoids getting stabbed.
episodes.title: Bill Hader Wears a Grey Button Down Shirt and Sneakers

episodes.synopsis: Casey delivers a showstopper! It's a musical extravaganza written by "Andrew Lloyd Webber" with a live-in studio phantom and lots of tuneful guests.
episodes.title: Casey Wilson Wears a White Lace Dress and a Black Blazer

episodes.synopsis: Rainn Wilson answers a 4-million-part question and listens to true cowboy stories. Reggie has a new superpower, plus there's a taxidermy contest.
episodes.title: Rainn Wilson Wears a Short Sleeved Plaid Shirt & Colorful Sneakers

episodes.synopsis: Pee-wee Herman casts spells and saves Scott's life for Halloween. Reggie has a surprise costume of his own.
episodes.title: Pee-wee Herman Wears a Halloween Costume

episodes.synopsis: Jessica Alba hosts a game show of her own, and she reveals a bit about her childhood. Scott travels the country helping women with their sweater woes.
episodes.title: Jessica Alba Wears a Jacket with Patent Leather Pumps

episodes.synopsis: Rashida Jones eats a bug. Monster truck driver Darryl Drummond announces his retirement.
episodes.title: Rashida Jones Wears a Black Blazer & Flowered Pants

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Reggie welcome guest Jim Gaffigan to the show. And everyone's favorite novelty furniture is back: Big Mouth Billy Bass.
episodes.title: Jim Gaffigan Wears a Blue Jacket & Plum T-Shirt

episodes.synopsis: Scott explores the myriad possibilities that one missed bus can make while Andy and Reggie split realities. A mysterious stranger offers Scott advice.
episodes.title: Andy Dick Wears a Black Suit Jacket & Skinny Tie

episodes.synopsis: Scott issues a warning to down-and-out celebrities, Clark gives us props, and we find out about a controversial new holiday for naughty little boys.
episodes.title: Clark Gregg Wears a Navy Blazer & White Collared Shirt

episodes.synopsis: Jason Schwartzman stops by the set for Take Your Kid to Work Day and helps Scott find the answer to one of this season’s most pressing questions.
episodes.title: Jason Schwartzman Wears a Striped Shirt & High Top Sneakers

episodes.synopsis: Cobie Smulders visits "Comedy Bang! Bang!" for the lost "pilot" episode. Visit the show's origins and discover the many changes in its long tenure.
episodes.title: Cobie Smulders Wears a Strapless Black & White Dress

episodes.synopsis: Zach Galifianakis joins Scott for a very special holiday moment, and Scott learns the meaning of Christmas when the bonuses get lost.
episodes.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears a Santa Suit

episodes.synopsis: Patton Oswalt competes with Scott for the same acting part, a turtle expert undergoes a nervous breakdown, and Reggie's real name is revealed.
episodes.title: Patton Oswalt Wears a Black Blazer and Dress Shoes

episodes.synopsis: Reggie gets swept up in an intergalactic war, while Craig Robinson seeks answers to a spicy question, and Scott helps refurbish houses.
episodes.title: Craig Robinson Wears a Bordeaux Button Down and Dark Jeans

episodes.synopsis: As a detective hunts for a killer on the set, Jenna Fischer shows a clip from her guest appearance on the British version of the show.
episodes.title: Jenna Fischer Wears a Floral Blouse and Black Heels

episodes.synopsis: Fred Armisen competes with Scott for a gig as a late-night talk show host, and Reggie's ultimate fantasy comes to light.
episodes.title: Fred Armisen Wears Black Jeans and Glasses

episodes.synopsis: In this imagining of the show's finale, Zach Galifianakis makes his first appearance since losing an arm in an accident, and some old friends stop by.
episodes.title: Zach Galifianakis Wears a One-Armed Jacket

episodes.synopsis: An on-set catastrophe forces Reggie and Scott to conserve air, and Scott becomes transfixed by guest Nick Offerman's epic mustache.
episodes.title: Nick Offerman Wears a Green Flannel Shirt and Brown Boots

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Reggie relive their all-time favorite moments from the show, guest Lizzy Caplan has a burning question, and "Weird Al" Yankovic stops by.
episodes.title: Lizzy Caplan Wears All Black and Powder Blue Espadrilles

episodes.synopsis: Tony Hawk offers advice to some crew members, the show's new boss is a mercurial 7-year-old, and Scott suffers a personal tragedy.
episodes.title: Tony Hawk Wears a Plaid Shirt and Silver Watch

episodes.synopsis: Reggie talks about his favorite baseball team, while Alison Brie shares her acting secrets, and a German director discusses his next film.
episodes.title: Alison Brie Wears a Black Mesh Top and Mini-Skirt

episodes.synopsis: With a little help from Josh Groban, Scott tries to go back in time to the 1960s to help Reggie's dad make it big.
episodes.title: Josh Groban Wears a Suit and Striped Socks

episodes.synopsis: Scott tries not to blow a shot at making a good impression on a glamorous actress who is the guest of his dreams; Scott fixes up a neglected school.
episodes.title: Ellie Kemper Wears a Purple Ruffled Sleeveless Top & Lavender Flats

episodes.synopsis: Scott's guest reveals how he will prepare for a real zombie apocalypse; a community activist stops by to talk about his programs.
episodes.title: Steven Yeun Wears Rolled Up Black Jeans & No Socks

episodes.synopsis: In the spirit of Halloween, Scott and his theatrics-loving musical guest are visited by a creepy couple and the show's accountant.
episodes.title: Wayne Coyne Wears a Halloween Costume

episodes.synopsis: This week's guest sits on the couch with the cast from one of television's most critically acclaimed series ever; Scott debuts a new character.
episodes.title: Dane Cook Wears a Black Blazer & Tailored Pants

episodes.synopsis: Scott's guest comes to the studio and meets the spunky new secretary working her way up the ranks; Reggie stars in a brand-new commercial.
episodes.title: Chris Hardwick Wears a Black Polo & Weathered Boots

episodes.synopsis: Scott's new guest drops by to celebrate Thanksgiving with the gang; Reggie invites some of his favorite comedians over for dinner.
episodes.title: Amber Tamblyn Wears a Leather Jacket & Black Booties

episodes.synopsis: It is Scott’s birthday, and his guest star wants to help him celebrate; Reggie pulls out all the stops to make it an episode Scott will never forget.
episodes.title: Kevin Smith Wears a Hockey Jersey & Jean Shorts

episodes.synopsis: A new guest star sits down with Scott as a familiar and adored cast member bids farewell; a poet drops by the studio to share his latest works.
episodes.title: Rob Corddry Wears Tan Dress Shoes & Red Socks

episodes.synopsis: Wanting a perfect show, Scott and Reggie take advantage of a scientist’s invention, leading them down a rabbit hole that could change everything.
episodes.title: Eric Andre Wears a Cat Collage Shirt & Sneakers

episodes.synopsis: The hottest toy on the market is in short supply, causing Christmas shoppers to go to extremes; The Lonely Island gets everyone in the holiday spirit.
episodes.title: The Lonely Island Wear Holiday Sweaters and White Pants
